heroTitle: The complete toolkit for modern hotels
heroSubtitle: Hotel Toolkit unifies inventory, automated ordering, approval flows, Opera PMS statistics, and automated quotes for group inquiries in one platform.
featureInventoryDesc: Manage stock by department and location with real-time insight into usage, shortages, and rotation.
featureOrderingDesc: Automate purchasing based on stock levels, usage patterns, and supplier agreements.
featureApprovalsDesc: Set up approval workflows by team or budget so every request stays transparent and auditable.
featureOperaDesc: Connect operational data with Opera PMS statistics for better forecasting and capacity decisions.
featureQuotesDesc: Generate consistent, profitable quotes for group inquiries faster with smart templates.
featureProcurementDesc: Compare pricing, monitor deliveries, and improve purchasing performance with clear KPIs.
